text: The Pelaco Tournament was a golf tournament held in Australia from 1955 to 1959. Peter Thomson won the event four of the five times it was contested. Total prize money for the 90-hole tournament was £2,500. The sponsor was Pelaco, an Australian shirt manufacturer. ==Winners== {| class="wikitable" !Year !! Winner !! Country !! Venue !! Score !!
